name: 劉建宏
objective: 本課程探討物件導向程式設計的原理, 語言與環境, 基本設計方法,  並以課程專題製作的方式使學者熟稔物件導向觀念. 課程內容: 物件與類別, 訊息傳遞, 繼承, 組合, 虛擬方法與多型性, 模板, 物件導向語言與環境, 專題
schedule:
Week              Topics
1                 Software development process
2                 A Quick Tour of C++
3                 Introduction to UML
4                 Inheritance and Polymorphism
5                 Singleton, Strategy
6                 Composite, Unit testing with CppUnit
7                 Iterator, Template Method, Interpreter
8                 Visitor, Builder
9                 Midterm Exam
10                Model, view and controller (MVC); Observer
11                Chain of Responsibility, Command
12                Memento, State
13                Flyweight, Facade
14                Abstract Factory, Factory Method
15                Mediator, Prototype
16                Adapte, Bridge
17                Decorator, Proxy
18                Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. Attendance, quizzes, and Homework 60%
2. Midterm Exam 20%
3. Final Exam 20%
materials:
1. Erich Gamma, Richard Helm, Ralph Johnson, and John Vlissides, Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software, Addison Wesley, 1995.
2. Stanley B. Lippman, Josee Lajoie, and Barbara E. Moo, C++ Primer, 4th Edition, Addison Wesley, 2005.
